title: Drawing, "Design for a Box", 1934
medium: Pen and black ink, green and yellow ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Watermarks: ANCNNES MANUFRES CANSON MONTGOLFIER - VIDALON - LES - ANNONAY
signed: In graphite, lower right: J. P./34
inscribed: In pen in ink, lower center: BOITE/PRiSE EN PLAqUES DE VERRE/LES PASTiLLES DORÉES S'ENCASTANT DANS LE REBORD CiRCULAiRE.; In graphite, above elevation of the box: four diameter symbols; In the lower body of the box: four 1's
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Low circular box with rounded edges drawn in plan and elevation. Rounded lid with eight applied ribs surmounted by a cylindrical finial composed of seven glass discs indicated in green ink to be executed in plate glass. On plan, a circular pellet at base of each rib. Underdrawing in graphite of box in golden section.
Puiforcat Fabrication #:

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Box", 1934.
1934. Pen and black ink, green and yellow ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-43.
